traits.Death Burst: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of sticky mud. Each Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 11+1d4 + 9 Dexterity saving throw or be restrained until the end of the creature's next turn.
traits.False Appearance: While the mephit remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary mound of mud.
